page.title: 06TRANSPORT
page.content: THERE ARE SEVERAL REASONS WHY THE BY-PASS IS BEING BUILT.HERE ARE SOME OF THEM:-1.TO REDUCE THE NUMBER OF ACCIDENTS.2.TO KEEP THE VILLAGE CLEANER AND QUIETER.3.TO RE-UNITE THE TWO HALVES OF THE VILLAGE, NOW DIVIDED BY THE MAIN ROAD.4.LESS WEAR AND TEAR OF THE ROADS.5.LESS CONGESTION.6.TO GIVE EMPLOYMENT TO THE BUILDING INDUSTRY.SOME PEOPLE ARE OPPOSED TO THE BY-PASS BECAUSE THE COUNTRYSIDE WILL BE SPOILT.ALSO TRADE FOR BUSINESSES LIKE THE GARAGE WILL BE AFFECTED.IT HAS BEEN AGREED THAT THE WESTERN OUTER ROUTE WILL BE CONSTRUCTED,AT AN APPROXIMATE LENGTH OF 3.3KM.A BY-PASS IS NOW BEING COMPLETED AT THE NEXT VILLAGE OF WOLLASTON AND IT IS HOPED THAT BOZEAT'S WILL FOLLOW SOON.
